title: Pbe Signup with a changed name
body: I Signed up for the pbe in the past, but I've changed my league name a few times before, do i have to sign up again?

replies.body: PBE applications are per account, so changing your summoner name shouldn't impact it.  The PBE Signup site is down currently, though, until further notice.   I don't have any info on when it will return, but we're keeping a tracker on it through our [PBE status ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)page.  Hang tight until then!
Oh ok, i signed up like many many months ago and i may have signed up again cause i changed my name and was worried it may not have registered with my old name.
